Posts.Content: beedunn wrote: I noticed a couple days ago in the shower that I had a lump in my right breast. I went to the doctor today and he scheduled me for an ultrasound. My mind keeps racing. I'm freaking out! I just gave birth to my beautiful baby girl 3 months ago! This is not at all how I expected such a beautiful time in our lives to be :( Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I'm 27 and found a lump in my right breast! I am so SCARED :'( beedunn Beesie
